pages.label: Introduction
content: With this Wizard it is super easy to annotate measurements of your experiment with ISA-compliant metadata according to FAIR principles.
Click on the Next button to start the metadata annotation of the results data of your experiments.

pages.label: Investigation Information
pages.prompt: Please provide the basic information of your Plant Phenotyping Project and when you submitted and published the Dataset.

fields.label: Investigation Title
fields.explanation: A short title for the investigation.

fields.label: Investigation Description
fields.explanation: A text summarising the plant phenotyping project in more detail.
fields.example: The migration of maize from tropical to temperate climates was accompanied by a dramatic evolution in flowering time. To gain insight into the genetic architecture of this adaptive trait, we conducted a 50K SNP-based genome-wide association and diversity investigation on a panel of tropical and temperate American and European representatives.

fields.label: License
fields.placeholder: Search for licence of your dataset
fields.explanation: The license that comes with your datasaet

fields.label: Submission Date
fields.explanation: The date when the investigation data was submitted.

fields.label: Public Release Date
fields.explanation: Date when the investigation data will be publicly released.
